20101230010211.000|20101230010214.000|CC1|HAVE MANAGED TO STOP THE

20101230010233.000|20101230010237.000|CC1|>> THIS IS ONE OF THE TWO PLACES

20101230010239.000|20101230010242.000|CC1|POLICE SWOOPED UP SUSPECTS IN A

20101230010244.000|20101230010245.000|CC1|"TERRIFYING."                   
20101230010245.000|20101230010247.000|CC1|>> WE HAVE BEEN FOLLOWING THEM

20101230010304.000|20101230010308.000|CC1|IN DENMARK ARE A 45 -- 44-YEAR-

20101230010334.000|20101230010335.000|CC1|TARGET, THE OFFICES OF THE      
20101230010335.000|20101230010337.000|CC1|NEWSPAPER WHICH FIRST PUBLISHED

20101230010341.000|20101230010343.000|CC1|CHALLENGED SELF-CENSORSHIP IN   
20101230010343.000|20101230010346.000|CC1|THE MEDIA, AN ACT REGARDED AS   
20101230010346.000|20101230010348.000|CC1|MANY -- REGARDED BY MANY MOSLEMS
20101230010348.000|20101230010350.000|CC1|AS AN INSULT TO THEIR FATE.

20101230010447.000|20101230010450.000|CC1|EARLIER THIS WEEK.              
20101230010450.000|20101230010450.000|CC1|BBC NEWS.                       
20101230010450.000|20101230010454.000|CC1|>> IN NORTHERN IRELAND, 36,000  
20101230010454.000|20101230010455.000|CC1|HOMES ARE STILL WITHOUT RUNNING 
20101230010455.000|20101230010500.000|CC1|WATER DUE TO FROZEN PIPES ACROSS

20101230010533.000|20101230010538.000|CC1|>> IT IS TOO LARGE.

20101230010824.000|20101230010825.000|CC1|NOW FOR 10 YEARS.

20101230010948.000|20101230010951.000|CC1|CONTINUE TO SUPPLY AND PROTECT  
20101230010951.000|20101230010952.000|CC1|ITSELF AND GUARD THE GOVERNMENT 
20101230010952.000|20101230010955.000|CC1|IN WAITING OF ALASSANE OUATTARA.
20101230010955.000|20101230010957.000|CC1|BUT SO FAR, THE INTERNATIONAL   
20101230010957.000|20101230011000.000|CC1|PRESSURE ON LAURENT GBAGBO HAS  
20101230011000.000|20101230011001.000|CC1|FAILED TO CONVINCE HIM TO LEAVE 
20101230011001.000|20101230011002.000|CC1|POWER.                          
20101230011002.000|20101230011004.000|CC1|THIS TEST CASE FOR AFRICAN
